trans-unit.source: Enables in-place updates to existing blocks of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 啟用現有區塊的就地更新<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata> is not associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> that is obtained through a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>, the attempt to write metadata by using the in-place writer will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>不與相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>取得透過<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>，嘗試使用就地寫入器寫入中繼資料將會失敗。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata>

trans-unit.source: Successful write operations apply the metadata directly to the image stream by means of a decoder.
trans-unit.target: 成功寫入作業的中繼資料將直接套用至影像資料流透過解碼器。

trans-unit.source: In-place metadata updates fail if an attempt is made to write metadata that a given bitmap format does not support.
trans-unit.target: 如果嘗試寫入指定的點陣圖格式不支援的中繼資料，就會失敗的中繼資料的就地更新。

trans-unit.source: To perform in-place metadata edits, the bitmap must be decoded using either the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache options.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行就地中繼資料的編輯，點陣圖必須先解碼使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>快取選項。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> does not guarantee access to the metadata stream needed for in-place metadata edits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>不保證存取編輯就地中繼資料所需的中繼資料資料流。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether image metadata can be saved successfully.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以成功儲存影像中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if bitmap metadata can be written successfully; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以寫入點陣圖中繼資料可順利啟動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
